title: So we can change summoner name but not 'username'?

replies.body:
Step 1. Transfer to NA.
Step 2. Make a new account using your old username.
Step 3. Transfer back to OCE.
As your username is already taken, you'll be prompted to choose a new username.

From what I understand Riot has stated in the past that your account details, information, history for what you have bought and etc are all tied to your username. They have a smart system that lets you display what name you are known as without having to change where the information for your account is tied to. This helps keeps thing all in the same spot if they need information on an account and they don't have to go chasing it down under a different name if it changed location.

I hope this helps to explain why this is, keep in mind your username is only used for logging into league, while it would be useful to change this if you wanted it really doesn't have an impact on what other players see your name as.

If you have any questions let me know and I hope this clarifies why this is.

~Elam
Why in the absolute possible fuck would you want or need to change your username?

Woah chill there, he's asking a simple question, no harm in that.

Unfortunately Moonland, no, you can't change your username. Perhaps you can if you really wanted or needed but that will have to go through Riot personally so I would suggest you ask them through a support ticket.
